subject: Personal Finance
title: The Endowment Effect
description: Learn The Endowment Effect in one minute.

hook.text: Hand someone a coffee mug. Now offer to buy it back. They demand double what it's worth.

buildup.text: Once we own something, we instantly value it more than before we had it.

discovery.text: Kahneman and Thaler proved this in a classic experiment. Mug owners wanted twice the buyer's price.

twist.text: It's not greed. Our brains feel losses more intensely than gains of the same size.

climax.text: Real estate, stocks, old clothes ‚Äî we overvalue everything we own simply because it's ours.

punchline.text: Owning it changes what it's worth to you.
